hero.title: Designing and Building
hero.subtitle: I craft structured, user-centric interfaces that blend aesthetics with functionality. Focusing on premium digital products.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a design-focused engineer who believes that great software is born at the intersection of technical excellence and user empathy. I don't just write code; I build products that solve real problems.

With a strong background in UI/UX and Frontend Development, I bridge the gap between design and engineering. I care deeply about the details—spacing, typography, animations, and performance—ensuring that every interaction feels intentional.
My approach is minimal, structured, and user-first. I avoid clutter and focus on clarity, creating digital experiences that are not only beautiful but also intuitive and accessible.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Interested in working together? Fill out the form below or send me an email.
